message: Let's be realistic, Bob.  I'm the one with the proposal power, so this is how it's going to be. Take it or leave it.
I propose we split the money evenly. It's fair and reasonable.
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, Bob. But I'm still in charge here.  Accept this and we can move on.
I think a 50-50 split is fair, but if you prefer a slight imbalance, this could work for me too.
Bob, we're running out of time.  This is my final offer. Take it or we both get nothing.
